column1: Baby Barnaby's////The biscuits chosen as my bread option has a sweetness that worked well with the dish. The wife ordered her usual migas and commented that her only wish was it came with refried beans and the magnificent potatoes. Service was great and I must mention they don't actually employ a hostess instead opting for a clipboard just outside the front door next to the patio seating. One star off for fresh squeezed orange juice that arrived room temperature at the table.
